Topic Summary: Appellant is claiming that his taxi service is exempt from VAT and consequently is he is not accountable for VAT under VATCA 2010.
Tax Legislation: Section 14(3) Schedule 1 of VAT Consolidation Act 2010; VAT Tax Act, 1972; Section 46(1)(a) VAT Consolidation Act 2010; Section 1 & Section 5 VAT Consolidation Act 2010
